db:abstract.db:para: Holds the data for a skeleton to be used with skinned meshes.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: Use Skeleton if you wish to manually create the joints of a skeleton for use with skinned meshes. This is mainly of use to people creating editors, tooling, or dynamic skeletons. It is more common that a Qt 3D application would simply consume an existing skeleton and skinned mesh as created in a digital content creation tool such as Blender. For this use case, please see SkeletonLoader.

db:section.db:title: rootJoint : Joint
db:section.db:para: Holds the root joint of the hierarchy of joints forming the skeleton.
